author: daxian-dbw
body:
This is work-in-progress to resolve #839.

This PR is only for Andy to take a look at my work on the ALC.
This implementation works fine for our existing native hosts in NanoServer, but not in PowerShell Core from repo yet.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @daxian-dbw I'm closing this because I've imported your changes into #1235 and we have the tests passing now (I think/hope).

title: WIP AssemblyLoadContext Dongbo's work
